00064 // usb_user_device_descriptor
00065 const S_usb_device_descriptor usb_dev_desc =
00066 {
00067   sizeof(S_usb_device_descriptor),
00068   DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR,
00069   Usb_format_mcu_to_usb_data(16, USB_SPECIFICATION),
00070   DEVICE_CLASS,
00071   DEVICE_SUB_CLASS,
00072   DEVICE_PROTOCOL,
00073   EP_CONTROL_LENGTH,
00074   Usb_format_mcu_to_usb_data(16, VENDOR_ID),

00079   SN_INDEX,

00081 };

00088     sizeof(S_usb_configuration_descriptor),

00109

00111     sizeof(S_usb_dfu_functional_descriptor),
00112     DFU_FUNCTIONAL_DESCRIPTOR,
00113     (DFU_WILL_DETACH            << 3) |
00114     (DFU_MANIFESTATION_TOLERANT << 2) |
00115     (DFU_CAN_UPLOAD             << 1) |
00116     DFU_CAN_DNLOAD,
00117     Usb_format_mcu_to_usb_data(16, DFU_DETACH_TIMEOUT),
00118     Usb_format_mcu_to_usb_data(16, DFU_TRANSFER_SIZE),

00120   }
